column5: going up to moosehorn lodge lac Seul the end of july, one of the best times we had was throwing topwater poppers for smallies, any chance they will be hitting up top at that time of the season...??
Might try early morning or evening. You might get some to rise and take the offering. That time of year I'm using tubes, flukes and deeper running crankbaits.
You should be fine we fish top water small mouth all summer. May not produce as much as some other methods but we've always done well.
